texts.textentryhtml: Don Eduardo Lucas Moreno, Paris (by 1924; sold to Pani); Alberto J. Pani, Mexico (until 1942; sale, Kende, New York, December 17, 1942, lot 3); private collection, New Jersey (until 1953; sale, Parke-Bernet, New York, October 28, 1953, lot 38, to Princeton University Art Museum).

bibliography.boilertext: "Acquisitions," Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 13, no. 2, (1954): p. 62-63.
